# Be the change you wish to see

**From:** Molly Young  <mollyyoung@substack.com>
**Date:** Sun, 1 Feb 2026 16:53:51 +0000
**Source:** [View original](https://mollyyoung.substack.com/p/be-the-change-you-wish-to-see)

---

View this post on the web at https://mollyyoung.substack.com/p/be-the-change-you-wish-to-see

One of the best things that happened to me in 2025 was that one of you clever readers, encouraged by this list , nabbed a vanity license plate reading UNGUENT. The reader reported that their UNGUENT plate led to some unexpected positive exchanges. The amount of happiness this brings me is: A Lot. 
At a time when things are falling apart and gyres are widening and people are recklessly citing Yeats, one way to remain human is to abet mischief in tiny ways. 
Here is a list of 75 vanity license plate ideas. They are all available  in NY state at time of posting. And probably in other states, too, though I havenâ€™t checked. 
Send me a photo if you end up snagging one of them!
-Molly
